All Classes and Interfaces

类
说明
BaseDeNpc
 
BattleNode
Represents a battle scenario node where the player character engages in combat with an enemy.
Bgm
A class responsible for playing background music in the game.
Boss
A concrete subclass representing a powerful boss enemy in the game.
ChanceNode
Represents a node in the game's narrative structure where the next path is determined randomly.
DecisionNode
Represents a node in the game's narrative structure where the player must make a decision.
Enemy
Abstract base class for enemy characters representing hostile entities in the game.
Event
The Event interface represents a general action or occurrence within the game.
Game
The Game class encapsulates all the elements and logic required to run the game.
GameFrame
The GameFrame class represents the main game window where game graphics are displayed.
GameTest
 
ImageNode
A decorator class that adds an image feature to nodes.
InnerNode
Represents an inner node within the game's narrative structure.
Item
 
Loot
 
Main
The main class to launch the text-based game.
Node
Represents an abstract Node in the game.
NodeDecorator
Represents a decorator for nodes in the game, providing additional functionality or information while maintaining the same interface as a standard node.
Npc_Merchant
 
Npc_VillageHead
 
Npc_Villager
 
PersonnageDeBase
A base class representing a character in the game.
PlayerCharacter
A class representing a player character in the game.
PlayerCharacterTest
 
Prof_Archer
The Archer profession class that implements the Profession interface.
Prof_Berserker
The Berserker profession class that implements the Profession interface.
Prof_MagicShooter
The Magic Shooter profession class that implements the Profession interface.
Profession
 
Race
 
SoundNode
A decorator class that adds sound playback capabilities to nodes.
TerminalNode
Represents a terminal node in the game's story, indicating an endpoint of a particular path or story arc.
Test
A class to test character creation and experience gain for the game.
